message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $2000000, reflecting its high quality and unique features. We believe it could significantly benefit your business operations. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset yours.
Thank you for offering me your premium product. I appreciate the value you place on it, but my budget allows for a lower price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000.
